actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to allow any chief of the Piscataway Indian Tribe to be buried at Piscataway Park in Oxon Hill, Md.

summary.text: Uniform Federal Welfare and Medicaid Assistance Act - Amends Title IV (Aid to Families with Dependent Children), Title XVIII (Medicare), and Title XIX for purposes of reimbursement to States under the programs of aid to needy families with children and medical assistance shall be set at 75 percent. Requires that the the non-Federal share of such aid and assistance be paid from State (rather than local) funds. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to allow any Piscataway Indian Chief, who dies after enactment of this Act, to be buried at Piscataway Park, in Oxon Hill, Maryland.

titles.title: A bill to allow any chief of the Piscataway Indian Tribe to be buried at Piscataway Park in Oxon Hill, Md.
